Kedington Library

Manager: Dawn Bamford

Community Centre, Arms Lane, Kedington
CB9 7QQ

Tel: 01440 703449
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Friends of Kedington Library

Social media:

  • Facebook

Unfortunately due to staff shortages Kedington Library will not be opening on Wednesday 15 February. We're sorry for any inconvenience this causes. For renewals and other assistance, please call our customer service line on 01473 351249.
